name: Vertical Slice (benpanski)
description:
Made in Global Game Jam 2023!

Develop your dream  game with Vertical Slice, where you'll master tech and art skills and delve into the roots of game development. Fix code, create art, and watch your simple game become a masterpiece. A thrilling journey into the heart of game creation awaits.


Art Team : Yarden HR , Ofek S , Ofir H.
Dev Team : Eli Z , Ben P, Sharon V, Dor ST.

Music by Ilai S
